subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Quinn followed up a bruising career as a hockey player by steering Canada to its first Olympic gold medal in 50 years and twice winning coach-of-the-year honors in the National Hockey League.
snippet: Quinn followed up a bruising career as a hockey player by steering Canada to its first Olympic gold medal in 50 years and twice winning coach-of-the-year honors in the National Hockey League.
